data.name: Canister
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into plastic.

data.name: Cans (Backpack Attachment)
data.description: A set of cans that are a backpack attachment from the quest Safe Passage.

data.name: Cat Bed
data.description: At least a tiny bit more comfortable than your face.

data.name: Cheer (Emote)
data.description: Cheer Emote - Quest reward from The Right Tool

data.name: Chemicals
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies, explosives, and utility items.

data.name: Coffee Pot
data.description: The power to face a new day, one drip at a time.

data.name: Combat Mk. 1
data.description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

data.name: Combat Mk. 2
data.description: A Combat augment is more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.
data.flavor_text: Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive)
data.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.
data.flavor_text: Restores 2 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.name: Combat Mk.3 (Aggressive) Blueprint
data.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types and comes with extra space for grenades

data.name: Combat Mk.3 (Flanking)
data.description: A Combat augment more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.
data.flavor_text: Stowed or unequipped Pistols and Hand Cannon are 33% faster to equip.

data.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking) Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking)

data.name: Compensator I
data.description: Slightly reduces per-shot dispersion.

data.name: Compensator II
data.description: Moderately reduces per-shot dispersion.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Compensator II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Compensator II

data.name: Compensator III
data.description: 30% Reduced Max-Shot Dispersion

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Compensator III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Compensator III

data.name: Complex Gun Parts
data.description: Used to craft advanced weapons.
data.flavor_text: Used to craft: Equalizer, Aphelion, Jupiter

data.name: Complex Gun Parts Blueprint
data.description: Used to craft advanced weapons.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Cracked Bioscanner
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Crimson Racer (Aviator Colour)
data.description: Crimson Racer (Aviator Colour) is a quest reward from Communication Hideout

data.name: Crude Explosives
data.description: Used to craft explosives. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Crumpled Plastic Bottle
data.description: Can be recycled into plastic parts.

data.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Damaged Hornet Driver
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: Damaged Tick Pod
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Damaged Wasp Driver
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Dam Control Center Tower Key
data.description: Unlocks a door in the Control Centre Tower on the top floor.

data.name: Dam Staff Room Key
data.description: Unlocks the Dam Staff Room in the Control Tower.

data.name: Dam Surveillance Key
data.description: Unlocks a door in the Water Treatment Control building in The Dam.

data.name: Dam Testing Annex Key
data.description: Unlocks a door in the Testing Annex on Dam Battlegrounds.

data.name: Dam Utility Key
data.description: Location is currently unknown except that it is on Dam Battlegrounds.

data.name: Dart Board
data.description: Some Raiders use it to practice dexterity. Others just like throwing things at other things.

data.name: Deadline
data.description: A mine that deals damage to anything within its radius once the timer runs out

data.name: Deadline Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Deadline Mine

data.name: Defibrillator
data.description: An injection that quickly revives downed raiders and restores some health.

data.name: Defibrillator Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Defibrillator

data.name: Deflated Football
data.description: Just by looking at this, you too start to feel slightly deflated.

data.name: Degraded ARC Rubber
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Diving Goggles
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Dog Collar
data.description: After all this time, you can still smell the goodness.

data.name: Doodly Duck
data.description: Everything is a canvs to a creative child.
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise.

data.name: Door Blocker
data.description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access.
